LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Disapproved.descriptio: Allowing a machine to decide to kill is an ugly thing.
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Horrible.description: Allowing a machine to decide to kill is a terrible thing.
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Prohibited.description: Allowing a machine to decide to kill is an absolutely inhuman thing to do.
